item.title: Install clonedeploy pxeboot server
item.description: I’ll show you how to create network booting (PXE) with clusterdeploy.

item.title: Install pxeboot server
item.description: Have you ever needed to troubleshoot or diagnose a problematic computer and you forgot where the utility CD is? We’ll show you how to utilize network booting (PXE) to make that problem a thing of the past.
